compatibility.notes: The Gnuplot license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Distribute corresponding source modifications in the form of a patch file along with binaries.
Add special version identification to distinguish your version.
Provide your name and address as the primary contact for support.
license.name: gnuplot
obligations: Include the copyright notice in all copies of the software.
Include the permission notice in supporting documentation.
Distribute modifications as patches to the released version.
Add special version identification to distinguish modified versions.
Provide contact information for support of modified versions.
Retain original authors' contact information for the base software.
